boatlicense.desc: This license allows you to borrow boats from Boathouses and explore the Chroma Sea.
boatlicense.name: Boating License

cassette.desc: A recording of Emiko, who once coached a Beastie that's currently stranded in the Chroma Sea.
cassette.name: Cassette Player

elevatorkey.desc: A key card that looks like it could be used to gain access to locked areas.
elevatorkey.name: Security Card

energy1.desc: Cures a Beastie of feeling [sprStatus,6]SWEATY outside of games
energy1.name: Star Soda

energy2.desc: Cures a Beastie of feeling [sprStatus,6]SWEATY and restores 25% STAMINA outside of games
energy2.name: Peptrolyte

energy3.desc: Cures a Beastie of feeling [sprStatus,6]SWEATY and restores 33% STAMINA outside of games
energy3.name: Daredillo Energy

fries.desc: Restores a Beastie's STAMINA by 33% outside of games
fries.name: French Fries

heal_a.desc: Restores a Beastie's STAMINA by 25% outside of games
heal_a.name: Snack

heal_b.desc: Restores a Beastie's STAMINA by 50% outside of games
heal_b.name: Protein Bar

heal_c.desc: Restores a Beastie's STAMINA by 100% outside of games
heal_c.name: Lunchbox

heal_max.desc: Revives a [sprStatus,5]WIPED Beastie and restores 100% STAMINA outside of games
heal_max.name: Smoothie

icecream.desc: Restores a Beastie's STAMINA by 20% and improves their mood
icecream.name: Ice Cream

jersey.desc: Recruit a Beastie that's level 10 or under. Woven from special mycelium.
jersey.name: Jersey

jersey2.desc: Recruit a Beastie that's level 20 or under. Its denser weave magnifies its bonding power.
jersey2.name: Club Jersey

jersey3.desc: Recruit a Beastie that's level 30 or under. Facilitates even better mycelial communication somehow.
jersey3.name: League Jersey

jersey4.desc: Recruit a Beastie that's level 40 or under. Its hyperdense weave magnifies willpower.
jersey4.name: Pro Jersey

jersey5.desc: Recruit a Beastie at any level. The pinnacle of mycelial weaving.
jersey5.name: Star Jersey

jersey_ex1.desc: Exchange a Jersey for a Club Jersey (can recruit higher level Beasties).
jersey_ex1.name: Jersey Upgrade

jersey_ex2.desc: Exchange a Club Jersey for a League Jersey (can recruit higher level Beasties).
jersey_ex2.name: Club Jersey Upgrade

jersey_ex3.desc: Exchange a League Jersey for a Pro Jersey (can recruit higher level Beasties).
jersey_ex3.name: League Jersey Upgrade

jersey_ex4.desc: Exchange a Pro Jersey for a Star Jersey (recruits any Beastie).
jersey_ex4.name: Pro Jersey Upgrade

jerseycharm.desc: A mycelial thread charm that will let you temporarily recruit any Beastie.
jerseycharm.name: Jersey Charm

jerseypatch.desc: A patch that can be applied to any Jersey when recruiting. Accelerates the recruit's stat growth.
jerseypatch.name: Jersey Patch

kingletter.desc: A letter of approval by a certain King. It denotes that the holder is someone important.
kingletter.name: King's Letter

lure_a.desc: Temporarily lures out rarer, stronger Beasties.
lure_a.name: Attract Spray

lure_b.desc: Lures out rarer, stronger Beasties. Longer lasting than Attract Spray.
lure_b.name: Super Attract Spray

lure_c.desc: Lures out rarer, stronger Beasties. The longest lasting concoction.
lure_c.name: MAX Attract Spray

pirate_drink.desc: Revives a [sprStatus,5]WIPED Beastie and restores 25% STAMINA outside of games
pirate_drink.name: Pirate Juice

pirate_food.desc: Restores a Beastie's STAMINA by 50% outside of games
pirate_food.name: Pirate Bites

repel_a.desc: Temporarily lowers the level of wild Beasties you encounter.
repel_a.name: Stinky Spray

repel_b.desc: Lowers the level of wild Beasties you encounter. Longer lasting than Stinky Spray.
repel_b.name: Super Stinky Spray

repel_c.desc: Lowers the level of wild Beasties you encounter. The most potent and longest lasting concoction.
repel_c.name: MAX Stinky Spray

sell1.desc: A shiny thing that can be sold.
sell1.name: Shiny Object

sell2.desc: A shiny thing that can be sold at a high price.
sell2.name: Sparkling Object

sell3.desc: A shiny thing that can be sold at a luxury price.
sell3.name: Glimmering Object

shinycharm.desc: An indispensable item for observing Beasties. Its holder has better odds of finding a Raremorph.
shinycharm.name: Old Guidebook

status_a.desc: Cures a Beastie of feeling [sprStatus,6]SWEATY outside of games
status_a.name: Water

status_b.desc: Revives a [sprStatus,5]WIPED Beastie and restores 50% STAMINA outside of games
status_b.name: Electrolytes

tatteredjersey.desc: A tattered old Jersey that belongs to a giant Beastie found in the Chroma Sea.
tatteredjersey.name: Tattered Jersey

train_ba.desc: Exchange at a GYM to train a Beastie's [sprIcon,0]POW +4pt
train_ba.name: Strength token

train_bd.desc: Exchange at a GYM to train a Beastie's [sprIcon,0]DEF +4pt
train_bd.name: Core token

train_ha.desc: Exchange at a GYM to train a Beastie's [sprIcon,1]POW +4pt
train_ha.name: Cardio token

train_hd.desc: Exchange at a GYM to train a Beastie's [sprIcon,1]DEF +4pt
train_hd.name: Dance token

train_level.desc: Bring to a GYM to raise a Beastie's Level by 1
train_level.name: Exercise Video

train_ma.desc: Exchange at a GYM to train a Beastie's [sprIcon,2]POW +4pt
train_ma.name: Study token

train_md.desc: Exchange at a GYM to train a Beastie's [sprIcon,2]DEF +4pt
train_md.name: Meditation token

train_reset.desc: Exchange at a GYM to reset a Beastie's trained stats
train_reset.name: Tea Leaves

train_tame_1.desc: Exchange at a GYM to raise a Beastie's COACHED % for improved stats
train_tame_1.name: Conditioning chip

train_tame_2.desc: Exchange at a GYM to raise a Beastie's COACHED % for improved stats
train_tame_2.name: Conditioning ticket

train_tame_3.desc: Exchange at a GYM to max a Beastie's COACHED % for perfect stats
train_tame_3.name: Conditioning pass

train_trait.desc: Exchange at a GYM to give your Beastie an extra-special, rejuvenating bath that changes their Trait
train_trait.name: Spa salts

trainspray_a.desc: A refreshing spray that makes Beasties earn 2x EXP and Training values for a short time.
trainspray_a.name: Athletic Spray

trainspray_b.desc: A refreshing spray that makes Beasties earn 2x EXP and Training values for a bit.
trainspray_b.name: Super Athletic Spray

trainspray_c.desc: A refreshing spray that makes Beasties earn 2x EXP and Training values for a while.
trainspray_c.name: MAX Athletic Spray

treasure.desc: Buried treasure that was hidden by pirates!
treasure.name: Buried Treasure

weavernote.desc: A tattered Jersey to be delivered to a freckled woman in Beryl.
weavernote.name: Jersey Bundle
